text: Need Sophie Anderson for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $2,409, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 1 x Instagram story, 2 x Event photography, 1 x Pinterest pin. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025.
